name: Find your contact
description:
A small project made in 03h12 for Trijam #205. However I did not submit the project cause I was not fully happy with the result (in particular I wanted to add some sounds and music but I was already above the time limit).

You have to find your contact in the crowd. Read the description scrolling in the bottom of the screen and click to the person matching it. The lowest is your score after three rounds, the closer you are to become a real secret agent.

Maybe someday I'll make a new version with sound and stuff like different difficulty modes. (No promises, though!)

Changelog

  • 1.0.1 (2023/02/05) :
    • Fix a bug where multiple NPCs could have the same appearance.
    • Fix a bug where clicking on score screen didn't send back to title screen.
    • Minor score screen adjustments.
